content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Greetings, Emilia Müller. While I appreciate your interest in the apartment in München, let us dive into negotiating the rental price for this exceptional property. To commence, I have an elevated figure in mind. However, I'm open to hearing your proposed amount as well.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand. I would like to propose a rental price of 800 Euros per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I regretfully find your offer insufficient, Emilia Müller. Given the prime location and desirable features of this apartment, I must hold out for something closer to my expectations.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understandable. I am willing to increase my offer to 850 Euros per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: While your latest proposal exhibits a slightly improved stance, it still falls short of my goals. I am unwilling to accept this price at the moment, but I encourage you to consider a more competitive figure in the near future should the opportunity arise.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I am confident that 850 Euros per month is a fair price for this apartment. It is in the city center and has many amenities. Therefore, I do not intend to increase my offer.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because my objective is to secure a higher rental price due to the apartment's considerable advantages and my personal business strategy. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
